E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 7/31/1975
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more than being a reliver.
I want a spot in the rotation, I think
I would do an adequate job. Otherwise, I'd like to play
elsewhere!

Regards,
Ron Tompkins



Date: Monday, 8/4/1975
Subject: Progress of Keith Moreland
Dear Sir,
Keith Moreland has nothing more to prove at AA San Antonio Brewers!
He has an AVG of .288 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 8/4/1975
Subject: Progress of Dave Skaggs
Dear Sir,
Dave Skaggs is hitting the ball well at AA San Antonio Brewers!
He has an AVG of .294, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
